title: Linear Equalisers with Dynamic and Automatic Length Selection.
abstract: NoA simple method for dynamically adjusting the number of taps of linear equalisers operating in unknown channel conditions is presented. Simulations with various scenarios show that the technique successfully predicts the optimum equaliser length and is capable of adjusting it as the environment change
